Articles.Content: Hello great devs, I noticed a game breaking bug for me. I cant lauch my vessel. I upgraded my launch site but it still has the old criteria. That means my ship is to heavy and tall. I think its a bug I couldnt find a solution to this online. If it isn't a bug and you could tell me how to fix it will be great! Thank you for reading this and keep on with the good work I love this game

Hello, and welcome to the forums! 

Moving to Technical Support.

What's the mass of your craft?

What's the height of your craft?

To which level is your launch site upgraded?

Edited February 13, 2019 by HebaruSan
did you close and reopen the game?
